bytebase.store.EventTriggerMetadata.json.description:
EventTriggerMetadata is the metadata for PostgreSQL event triggers.
 Event triggers are database-level objects that fire on DDL events.

comment.description: The comment on the event trigger.

definition.description:
The full CREATE EVENT TRIGGER definition from pg_get_event_trigger_def().
 SDL output should prefer using this field.

event.description: The event type: DDL_COMMAND_START, DDL_COMMAND_END, SQL_DROP, TABLE_REWRITE.

functionName.description: The name of the function to execute.

functionSchema.description: The schema of the function to execute.

name.description: The name of the event trigger.

bytebase.store.EventTriggerMetadata.json.title: Event Trigger Metadata
